document.full_text: trade judges wednesday partially overturned a ruling that had accused eu states of giving airbus illegal subsidies, but said the aircraft maker did receive billions of dollars of unfair aid that harmed boeing.
document.title: wto gives mixed verdict on airbus appeal
lines_and_colors: trade judges wednesday partially overturned a ruling that had accused eu states of giving airbus illegal subsidies, but said the aircraft maker did receive billions of dollars of unfair aid that harmed boeing.
